title: E-file a State Tax Return
description: After filing the federal return, a taxpayer needs to e-file their state income tax return.

tasks.description: Import the relevant data from the completed federal return into the state tax return form.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully transfers federal AGI and other necessary data to the state form.

tasks.description: Make any necessary state-specific adjustments (e.g., for municipal bond interest).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly makes all required state adjustments.

tasks.description: Finalize and e-file the state tax return.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully submits the state return and receives an acceptance confirmation.
